original_text: For when every commandment of the law had been declared by Moses to all the people, he took the blood of calves and goats, with water and scarlet wool and hyssop, and sprinkled both the book itself and all the people,
korean_text: 모세가 율법대로 모든 계명을 온 백성에게 말한 후에 송아지와 염소의 피 및 물과 붉은 양털과 우슬초를 취하여 그 두루마리와 온 백성에게 뿌리며

sentences.original_text: For when every commandment of the law had been declared by Moses to all the people,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 모세가 율법의 모든 계명을 모든 백성에게 선포했을 때,

sentences.original_text: he took the blood of calves and goats,
with water and scarlet wool and hyssop,
and sprinkled both the book itself and all the people,
